tokens.name: Bitcoin
tokens.description: The first decentralized cryptocurrency, widely known as digital gold.

tokens.name: Ethereum
tokens.description: A decentralized platform that enables smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps).

tokens.name: Ripple
tokens.description: A digital payment protocol and cryptocurrency known for its fast transaction processing and low fees.

tokens.name: Litecoin
tokens.description: A peer-to-peer cryptocurrency that is often referred to as silver compared to Bitcoin's gold.

tokens.name: Chainlink
tokens.description: A decentralized oracle network that enables smart contracts to securely interact with real-world data.
